orbit_accuracy¶

Linearized error determination for orbital elements.

These error are calculated as a function of:

  • Mean track length (track_length) seconds
  • Number of tracklets: (n_tracklets), int
  • Measurement spacing: (m_spacing), seconds
orbit_accuracy.atmospheric_errors(o, a_err_std=0.01, N_samps=200)[source]¶

Estimate position errors as a function of time, assuming a certain error in atmospheric drag.

orbit_accuracy.create_measurements(o, radar, t0=0, track_length=1000.0, n_tracklets=2, n_meas=10, debug=False, max_time=259200.0)[source]¶

orbit_accuracy.get_inertial_basis(ecef0, ecef0_dt)[source]¶

Given pos vector, and pos vector at a small positive time offset, calculate unit vectors for along track, normal (towards center of Earth), and cross-track directions
